description: Content type schemas for ethereum.org. Documents frontmatter and translation key patterns for content validation.

schemas.description: Definitions for content type frontmatter and data structures used throughout the ethereum.org codebase.

docs.description: Schema for developer documentation pages. Found in public/content/developers/docs/. These are standard documentation articles covering Ethereum concepts and development topics.

title.description: Page title displayed in browser tab and as the main heading. Should be concise and descriptive.

metaTitle.description: Optional SEO-optimized title for search engines. Used when a more detailed title is needed for SEO than the display title.

description.description: Brief summary of page content. Used in meta tags and search results. Should be 1-2 sentences.

lang.description: ISO 639-1 language code indicating the content language. Canonical content uses 'en'. Translations use their respective codes.

examples.title: Gas and fees
examples.description: Learn about Ethereum gas fees, how they're calculated, and their role in network security and transaction processing.

examples._comment: Docs page with metaTitle for SEO

examples.metaTitle: Ethereum gas and fees: technical overview

tutorials.description: Schema for developer tutorials. Found in public/content/developers/tutorials/. These are community-contributed how-to guides with author attribution and skill level classification.

title.description: Tutorial title. Should clearly describe what the reader will learn or build.

description.description: Summary of tutorial content and learning outcomes. Used in meta tags and listings.

author.description: Author username or display name. Attribution for the tutorial creator.

tags.description: Topic tags for categorization and filtering. Use lowercase with spaces for multi-word tags.

skill.description: Skill level required to follow the tutorial.

lang.description: ISO 639-1 language code. Same as docs.

published.description: Original publication date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

source.description: Name of the original source/publication if republished content.

sourceUrl.description: URL to the original source if content originated elsewhere.

address.description: Ethereum address for author donations or tips. Format: 0x followed by 40 hex characters.

locales.description: Schema for internationalization (i18n) translation files. Found in src/intl/{locale}/. Each locale directory contains JSON files with translation key-value pairs.

structure.description: Flat JSON object where keys are translation identifiers and values are translated strings. Keys use kebab-case. Values may contain HTML markup for links and formatting.
structure.valuePattern: Translated string, may contain HTML tags for links (<a>) and formatting (<strong>, <sup>)

localeDirectories.description: Available locale directories in src/intl/. Each contains JSON files for different page namespaces.

filePatterns.description: JSON files within each locale directory, organized by page or feature namespace.

examples._comment: Sample translation key-value pairs from common.json
